item.title: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）主席称萨瓦德尔出售 TSB 的 "时机未到
item.description: BBVA SA 主席卡洛斯-托雷斯（Carlos Torres）批评了萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）决定探索出售其英国分部的时机，同时坚称此举不会破坏他对这家西班牙竞争对手的竞购。【原文：BBVA SA Chairman Carlos Torres criticized the timing of Banco Sabadell SA’s decision to explore a sale of its UK unit, while insisting such a move wouldn’t derail his bid for the Spanish rival.】

item.title: 美国拥有比中国更多的铜，但无法提炼所有铜
item.description:
该行业需要克服高昂的能源和劳动力成本、环保法规以及过剩的中国廉价竞争，才能使美国铜冶炼业再度辉煌。【原文：

The industry will need to overcome high energy and labor costs, environmental regulations and a glut of cheap Chinese competition to make US copper smelting great again.

】

item.title: Netflix 新增法国 TF1 电视频道的电视直播和体育节目
item.description: Netflix Inc. 将增加法国广播公司 TF1 的直播电视频道和节目，扩大流媒体平台为该国用户提供的直播服务。【原文：Netflix Inc. will add live television channels and shows from French broadcaster TF1, expanding the streaming platform’s live offer for customers in the country.】

item.title: 耶伦和伯南克反对美国共和党支持削减金融研究经费
item.description: 前美联储主席珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）和本-伯南克（Ben Bernanke）以及其他一些学者、市场参与者和前财政部官员敦促国会领导层反对削减负责收集数据以防止另一场金融危机的办公室。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Chairs Janet Yellen and Ben Bernanke, along with several other academics, market participants and former Treasury officials, urged congressional leadership to oppose cuts to an office charged with gathering data aimed at preventing another financial crisis.】

item.title: 菲律宾中央银行行长称比索干预 "徒劳无益
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，干预货币市场以支撑比索是徒劳的，比索本月已下跌约 2%。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona said it’s futile to intervene in the currency market to support the peso, which has fallen about 2% this month.】

item.title: 中国抨击七国集团和冯德莱恩对其政策的批评
item.description: 中国抨击七国集团干涉中国内政，并斥责一位欧洲高级官员批评中国政府的稀土和经济政策。【原文：China has attacked the Group of Seven nations for what it called interference in its internal affairs and chastised a top European official for criticizing Beijing’s rare earth and economic policies.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩改革停滞不前，债券涨幅超过 200
item.description: 新兴市场债券投资者去年最赚钱的赌注，如今却让他们蒙受了两位数的损失；黎巴嫩银行业改革停滞不前，主权债务一落千丈。【原文：Emerging-market bond investors’ most profitable bet of the past year is now handing them double-digit losses — as Lebanon’s stalled banking reforms sink its sovereign debt.】

item.title: 以色列谢克尔的平静受到威胁，各种选择预示着动荡
item.description: 期权交易员们正准备迎接以色列谢克尔自 2023 年加沙战争爆发以来的任何一次剧烈波动；这是对冲以色列谢克尔迄今为止在国家多重冲突中表现出的韧性崩溃的一种手段。【原文：Options traders are bracing for the Israeli shekel to experience wilder moves than at any time since the start of the Gaza war in 2023 — a hedge against any breakdown in the resilience it’s so far shown against the nation’s multiple ongoing conflicts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称经济前景面临 "实质性 "风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧元区的经济前景面临着 "巨大的 "危险，官员们正在努力评估这些危险。【原文：The euro-zone’s economic prospects face “substantial” dangers that officials are struggling to assess, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 瑞银确认外部供应商遭网络攻击后数据被盗
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，该公司一家供应商的信息在一次网络攻击中被盗。此前，瑞士一家报纸报道称，该公司 130,000 多名员工的数据遭到黑客攻击。【原文：UBS Group AG said that information about the company had been stolen in a cyber attack on one of its suppliers, following a report a Swiss newspaper that data on more than 130,000 employees had been subject to a hack.】

item.title: 汇丰银行任命 Chua 为管理与市场营销部主管，将业务拓展至亚洲和中东地区
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）任命Christopher Chua为并购业务主管，该银行在进行全面改革后将目标锁定在亚洲和中东地区。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has appointed Christopher Chua as head of mergers and acquisitions as the lender targets growth in Asia and the Middle East after a sweeping revamp.】

item.title: 南非 5 月通胀保持稳定，风险加剧
item.description: 南非 5 月份的通胀率保持稳定，但通胀前景的不确定性却在增加，这使得中央银行下个月开会时的任务变得更加复杂。【原文：South African inflation held steady in May as uncertainty around its outlook mounts, complicating the task for the central bank when it meets next month.】

item.title: 欧盟称阿里巴巴在数字调查中未能阻止非法销售
item.description: 欧盟升级了对阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）旗下电子商务服务公司阿里速卖通（AliExpress）的调查，指责该公司未能解决非法产品在其平台上传播的问题。【原文：The European Union escalated a probe against Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s e-commerce service AliExpress, accusing it of failing to tackle the spread of illegal products on its platform.】

item.title: 瑞典央行下调关键利率并发出可能进一步宽松的信号
item.description: 瑞典央行将借贷成本降低了四分之一个百分点，重新开始尝试启动这个北欧最大经济体的增长，并表示有可能采取更多宽松措施。【原文：Sweden’s central bank lowered borrowing costs by a quarter point, resuming attempts to jump-start growth in the biggest Nordic economy, and said even more easing is possible.】

item.title: 日本监管机构将加强对银行重新包装日本国债的审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本金融监管机构计划加强对大约 670 亿美元以政府债券和其他资产为支持的高收益贷款的审查，这些贷款在地区性银行中很受欢迎。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator plans to ramp up scrutiny of about $67 billion of high-yield loans backed by government bonds and other assets that have become popular among regional banks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球风险大于增长焦点，印尼维持关键利率不变
item.description: 面对全球贸易战和中东日益加剧的冲突，印尼央行维持利率不变，暂停降息以支持印尼盾。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged, pausing its cuts to support the rupiah in the face of the global trade war and growing conflicts in the Middle East.】

item.title: 法国奥迪斯公司在纽约申请破产保护
item.description: 在 Altice 法国公司向纽约南区法院申请第 15 章破产保护几周后，该公司在法国进入了加速保障程序，以帮助其解决债务负担问题。【原文：Altice France filed for Chapter 15 bankruptcy protection in the Southern District of New York a few weeks after the company entered accelerated safeguard proceedings in France to help it address its debt burden.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 首次公开募股在冲突焦虑中下跌
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 公司周三在利雅得的首次交易中下跌，因为以色列和伊朗之间不断升级的冲突波及整个地区股市，并给航空股带来压力。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Flynas Co. fell in its Riyadh trading debut on Wednesday as the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran reverberates across regional equity markets and pressures airline stocks.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气连续第六天上涨，霍尔木兹运输成为焦点
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格连续第六天上涨，创下近四周来的最长连涨纪录，原因是以色列和伊朗之间的冲突引发了人们对能源贸易要道霍尔木兹海峡船舶运输的担忧。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains for a sixth day, the longest streak in almost four weeks, as the conflict between Israel and Iran raises concerns over vessel traffic via the Strait of Hormuz, a key energy trade route.】

item.title: Star Capital 考虑对国防科技公司 Vincorion 进行首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，随着投资者对欧洲航空航天和国防资产价值的提升，Star Capital 正在考虑对德国国防技术公司 Vincorion 进行首次公开募股。【原文：Star Capital is considering an initial public offering of German defense technology firm Vincorion, people familiar with the matter said, as rising investor interest lifts the value in European aerospace and defense assets.】

item.title: 德国市场走强，法国不受投资者青睐
item.description: 在欧洲风起云涌的这一年，有一个重要市场却没有得到投资者的青睐：法国。【原文：In a year that’s all about Europe, there’s one key market missing out on all the investor love: France.】

item.title: 印尼将对违反环保规定的镍园公司进行制裁
item.description: 印尼将对一个工业园区内违反环境规定的公司进行制裁，该工业园占印尼镍产量的很大一部分。【原文：Indonesia will sanction companies for environmental breaches at an industrial park that accounts for a large slice of its nickel output.】

item.title: 野村称美国将制定亚洲高关税以阻止中国改变路线
item.description: 据野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：The US may keep elevated tariffs on Southeast Asian countries amid data suggesting that China is diverting goods through the region to avoid higher levies, according to Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 印尼将传唤 BI 副主席作为贪污案证人：Technoz
item.description: 据当地新闻媒体 Technoz 周三报道，印尼反贪局已发函传唤印尼银行副行长菲利亚宁希-亨达塔（Filianingsih Hendarta），要求他在一起与社会项目有关的贪污案中作为证人接受讯问。【原文：Indonesia’s anti graft agency has sent a letter summoning Bank Indonesia Deputy Governor Filianingsih Hendarta for questioning as a witness in a graft case related to a social program, local news outlet Technoz reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的赌场运营商 Cirsa 宣布在西班牙上市
item.description: Blackstone 公司旗下的赌场运营商 Cirsa Enterprises 宣布了在西班牙首次公开募股的计划。【原文：Cirsa Enterprises, the casino operator owned by Blackstone Inc., announced plans for an initial public offering in Spain.】

item.title: 英国央行决议前英国通胀率维持在一年多以来最高水平
item.description: 英国通胀率保持在一年多以来的最高水平，在英国央行权衡能源市场动荡将在多大程度上影响其降息之路之际，物价压力依然强劲，令人不安。【原文：UK inflation remained at its highest level in more than a year, keeping price pressures uncomfortably strong as the Bank of England weighs how much energy market turmoil will affect its path to cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 4 月通胀率高于预期
BBVA 正与 Cerberus 和 One William Street 商谈贷款销售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，BBVA SA 正在就向包括 Cerberus Capital Management 西班牙分部和 One William Street Capital Fund 在内的基金出售总额约为 6.5 亿欧元（7.54 亿美元）的两个贷款组合进行深入谈判。【原文：BBVA SA is in advanced talks to sell two loan portfolios totaling around €650 million ($754 million) to funds including Cerberus Capital Management’s Spanish unit and One William Street Capital Fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莫迪反驳特朗普关于巴基斯坦停火的说法
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于在上个月的军事冲突中利用贸易协议与巴基斯坦达成停火协议的说法提出了质疑。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi disputed President Donald Trump’s claims that trade deals were used to clinch a ceasefire with Pakistan during last month’s military conflict.】

item.title: 中国 5 月稀土出口下滑，磁铁销售受到抑制
item.description: 中国稀土产品（包括目前与美国关系紧张的强力磁铁）的出口量在5月份跌至五年来的新低，原因是中国政府的出口限制措施扼杀了稀土产品的流动。【原文：China’s exports of rare earth products — including powerful magnets now at the heart of tensions with the US — slumped to a fresh five-year low in May as Beijing’s export curbs choked flows.】
